name: Nova Conflict: Dark Genesis
description:
You have been tasked with investigating a mysterious ship that has entered orbit around the colony planet of Naverion which lies in Iron Legion space.  

This short game was made for a college project and is also the first finished game I have ever made. This is also a side story for another game that is in development called Nova Conflict. If you wish to check that game out click the link below.

http://www.novaconflict.com/
